fsFields.label:
Has the Project scored at least a 5 for each of the following criteria:
• Biodiversity: Biodiversity and Invasive Species (P-19, I-15, O-15);
• Project affected people and livelihoods: Project-Affected Communities and Livelihood (P-13, I9, O-9), Resettlement (P-14, I10, O-10) and Indigenous People (P-15, I-11, O-11);
• Hydrology: Hydrological Resource (P-7), Downstream Flow Regimes (P-23, I-20, O-19); and
• Design safety: Infrastructure Safety (P-8, I-5, O-6).

listOptions.displayText: Legally recognised land tenure and logging rights cannot be demonstrated.
listOptions.value: Legally recognised land tenure and logging rights cannot be demonstrated.

fsFields.label: Do local communities have legal or customary tenure or land use rights in connection with the Project or Assets?
fsFields.name: in_palm_land_control

listOptions.displayText: There are no local communities with legal or customary tenure or land use rights in connection with the Project or Assets.
listOptions.value: There are no local communities with legal or customary tenure or land use rights in connection with the Project or Assets.

listOptions.displayText: Local communities maintain control of forest operations.
listOptions.value: Local communities maintain control of forest operations.

listOptions.displayText: Local communities have delegated control with free prior and informed consent, in accordance with IFC and RSPO requirements and this can be demonstrated through documentation .
listOptions.value: Local communities have delegated control with free prior and informed consent, in accordance with IFC and RSPO requirements and this can be demonstrated through documentation .

listOptions.displayText: A documented and time-bound process is being followed, incorporated in transaction documentation, to ensure that free prior and informed consent is obtained from local communities or that they have sufficient control of forest operations.
listOptions.value: A documented and time-bound process is being followed, incorporated in transaction documentation, to ensure that free prior and informed consent is obtained from local communities or that they have sufficient control of forest operations.

fsFields.label: Is or does the Project or Asset include a Palm oil Mill?

listOptions.displayText: No
listOptions.value: No

listOptions.displayText: Yes, but these suppliers operate in accordance with all relevant international, regional and national laws. (Clients who are compliant with the RSPO P&Cs should ensure that these suppliers are also compliant with the RSPO P&Cs for independent smallholders)
listOptions.value: Yes, but these suppliers operate in accordance with all relevant international, regional and national laws. (Clients who are compliant with the RSPO P&Cs should ensure that these suppliers are also compliant with the RSPO P&Cs for independent smallholders)

listOptions.displayText: Yes; compliance of these suppliers with all relevant international, regional and national laws cannot be confirmed.
listOptions.value: Yes; compliance of these suppliers with all relevant international, regional and national laws cannot be confirmed.
